translations.translation: By God', he said, 'you had almost ruined me.
He will say to him: -- By Allah, you almost ruined me.
He will say to his friend in hell, "By God, you almost destroyed me.
He said, “By Allah, you had nearly ruined me!”
He said: "By Allah! You have nearly ruined me."
He shall say: By Allah! you had almost caused me to perish;
He says, 'By God, wellnigh thou didst destroy me;
He saith: By Allah, thou verily didst all but cause my ruin,
He will say, "By God! You almost brought me to ruin!
And he will say: by Allah, thou hadst wellnigh causedest me to perish.
He will say, ‘By Allah, you had almost ruined me!
He said: "By Allah! thou wast little short of bringing me to perdition!
He said: "By Allah! You have nearly ruined me.
By Allah' he will say, 'you almost destroyed me!
He will say, “By God, you almost ruined me.
He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.

[37:56] He will say, to him, acknowledging that he [the latter] deserves his fate: ‘By God! You very nearly destroyed me, you [almost] ruined me through your misguidance (in, this has been softened from the hardened form [inna]).
(He saith: By Allah, thou verily didst all but cause my ruin) you almost led me away from Religion and you would have certainly destroyed me if I obeyed you,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ } معناه تَهْلِكُني

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالَ } له بعد ما رآه في النار مقسم على سبيل التأكيد والمبالغة: { تَٱللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ } [الصافات: 56] يعني: والله إنك أيها الجاهل المفرد، قد قاربت من إهلاكي بإغرائك وإغوائك ونصحك إليّ، وتذكيرك على ما يدل على إنكار البعث واستدلالك على استحالته

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { قال تالله إِنْ كِدتَّ لتُردِينِ } لتُهلكني بإغوائك
